MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh affecting properties in Garden Terrace. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30pm due to a faulty underground cable and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:06pm on 15th December 2020.
